document.full_text: hundreds of taliban fighters attacked and briefly seized parts of a district in afghanistan's remote and mountainous northeast on wednesday, provincial officials said, with gunfights raging for hours between insurgents and afghan troops.
document.title: insurgents briefly capture afghan district
lines_and_colors: hundreds of taliban fighters attacked and briefly seized parts of a district in afghanistan's remote and mountainous northeast on wednesday, provincial officials said, with gunfights raging for hours between insurgents and afghan troops.
